name: Radhu
greetingText: I really like your name btw!
wishText: May god always be with you my dear! ;)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah blah...
text2: Hehe just kidding, i wouldn't wish you in such way haw
text3: These little surprises are nothing compared to what you have done for me
text4: I realised that today, I want to do something unique for you, something-
outroText: Okay, now make a wish haha! I hope all your wishes come true cutu
